src:
I Rajković morao po loptu u mrežu, bezopasni gosti u Ligi 1
03 Nov 2019, 23:27 by Zile
Domaće ekipe bile su stoprocentne u nedeljnim utakmicama francuske Lige 1.
Bordo je pobedio Nant sa 2:0. Žirondinci su golovima Kamanoa u prvom, odnosno Hvanga u drugom poluvremenu, savladali „kanarince“ i sprečili ih da se vrate na drugo mesto. U domaćem timu od 60. minuta igrao je Vukašin Jovanović.
Poklekao je i sjajni srpski golman Predrag Rajković. Reprezentativac naše zemlje savladan je posle tri utakmice na kojima nije primio gol, a njegov Rems je izgubio od Nice sa 2:0. Domaćin je oba gola postigao u prvom poluvremenu, a strelci su bili Siprijen i Erel. Još kod rezultata 0:0 gosti su ostali sa desetoricom, pošto je isključen Dumbija. Odbrana Remsa i dalje je najbolja u ligi, pošto je posle 12 kola primila najmanje golova, samo šest.
U poslednjoj utakmici kola Sent Etjen je dočekao Monako. U zanimljivom meču odlučio je jedan pogodak, a postigli su ga domaći fudbaleri u 59. minutu preko Buange. „Kneževi“ su doživeli tek drugi poraz u poslednjih sedam utakmica, računajući i Kup takmičenje.
Bordo – Nant 2:0(1:0)Nica – Rems 2:0(2:0)Sent Etjen – Monako 1:0(0:0)

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Rajkovic also had to take the ball into the net, the harmless guests in League 1
03 Nov 2019, 22:27 by Zile
The home teams were 100% concentrated in Sunday's French Ligue 1 games.
Bordeaux beat Nantes 2-0. The Girondins overcame the Canaries with goals from Kamano in the first, or Hwang in the second half, and prevented them from returning to second place. Vukasin Jovanovic played in the 60-minute home team.
Great Serbian goalkeeper Predrag Rajkovic also came down. Our national team was defeated after three games in which he did not score, and his Rems lost to Nice 2-0. The hosts scored both goals in the first half and the scorers were Siprijen and Erel. Even with the score 0: 0, the guests were left with ten as Dumbia was excluded. The Rems defense is still the best in the league, having conceded the fewest goals, just six, after 12 rounds.
In the last game of the round St. Etienne welcomed Monaco. In an interesting match, one goal was decided by the home footballers in the 59th minute via Buanga. The "Princes" have only suffered a second defeat in the last seven games, including the Cup competition.
Bordeaux - Nantes 2: 0 (1: 0) Nice - Reims 2: 0 (2: 0) Saint-Etienne - Monaco 1: 0 (0: 0)
